summary: Abode near Fort Amol, English and Polish versions concluded.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1372.photobucket.com/albums/ag348/MarcusCzarnas/MAi/7aec1d5f-6c4b-45d0-bb60-4b96d630a35c_zps21333f2c.png[/img]
[size=3][color=#0000ff]This is my first mod, so please, don't judge me hard :P.
My plan is to add several houses like that all over the Skyrim. If you have some localization where this type of shack will be useful, leave your idea in comments. Thank you, I hope you'll enjoy my mod.
Please leave feedback about any bugs.[/color]
Here's my second mod:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57293/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D57293%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Water Rock Shack - Player House[/url]

[img]http://i1372.photobucket.com/albums/ag348/MarcusCzarnas/17ab78a2-839b-4a8f-9c72-5358bc2164c4_zps51f04c05.png[/img]
[color=#ff0000][size=3]Adds little house near Fort Amol. It's located at the river and waterfall. House is protected by stockade walls.
It has basic bedroom, kitchen, basement (training room, alchemy and enchanting workshop), also small bathroom.
There are some salmons in water, so have a nice fishing![/size][/color]


[img]http://i1372.photobucket.com/albums/ag348/MarcusCzarnas/MAi/ca07928d-6bb8-49c5-bc70-d520ab9648b6_zpsec3395fa.png[/img]﻿
[color=#ff0000]Here's the specific localization.[/color]

[img]http://i1372.photobucket.com/albums/ag348/MarcusCzarnas/MAi/87aac213-ee78-4373-abb1-0a95a3ebbec5_zps84528d8d.png[/img]
author: MarcusCzarnas
